column3: â€œExcellent, long-lasting, clear-headed body high. Testing at nearly 30% THC, you only need a couple puffs.â€
â€œReally good stuff, had me blazed off just a couple tokes. Highly recommended for use in the bedroomâ€

â€œI just picked up an eighth of this tonight, and just finished a bowl...I always read up on the strains before I smoke..well not this time...and man I should have...I would have to say, being more of an Indica fan, out of the four strains I have at the moment, which are all really good as well(Bubba Kush, GSC, Yoda OG, and Everlast..of course) this is definitely the most potent and the most beautiful body high of the ...â€

â€œBetter than the average strain. The high was pretty good, very indica type high that just put me to bed. The skunky taste wasn't the best, as I usually go for more sweet strains, but it was very strong smelling and THC content was VERY HIGH. Not for beginners.â€
â€œThis is a nice strain that is good for stress, body pains and aches, and has long lasting effects. Very happy with this strain.â€
â€œI feel super content with myself, confident and happy yet very mellow and focused. Love the smell and aftertaste! No munchies which I love but it does for others . 10/10â€
â€œVery nice body high. Love the taste. Definitely use before bed. It will have you couch locked.â€

â€œTOMS HEMP & CANNABIS..his own strain very potent heavy indicia dominant strain. one of many great
 strains from this grower. make sure to ask your local retailer for the American lot lead....â€
â€œI prefer indicas - heavy strong ones. And I'm happy to say this strain doesn't disappoint. Heavy body weight, too many tokes and you won't get off the couch!â€
â€œThis strain will kill any headache or boy ache and put you right to sleepğŸ˜´. My favorite strain of kushâ€

â€œtried a pre-roll of this strain and it is very nice! definitely a night time smoke (couch lock will definitely happen). Pretty heavy body high and you feel it within minutes and lasted a few hours. Perfect for a lazy movie/gaming night, or cooling out and listening to some good tunes. this is a strain that myself personally could only smoke alone though as it made me a bit paranoid. would and probably will purchase a...â€
â€œVery good strain for day to day smoking, but simulates munchies like there's no tomorrow. I recommend this for appetite simulation and an overall good feeling mentally.â€
